Name: Biters & Bullets: Prologue
About the game: Biters & Bullets: Prologue is an auto-attacking rogue-lite action game and works as a standalone teaser for our upcoming game. You will battle against hordes of zombies, acquire experience to level up and make strategic choices to become stronger than your enemies. Heavily inspired by great rogue-likes such as Vampire Survivors, Magic Survival and Risk of Rain. Features (more content in full version) 16 Weapons 35 Powerups 1 Large map 1 Boss Permanent Progression Earn cash in your runs and spend them in the Lobby. You can unlock primary weapons and characters that offer a variety of gameplay experiences. Upgrade the characters and find the one that best fits your playstyle. Boss fights Who doesn’t love boss fights? At the end of every level you will encounter a boss with their own unique mechanics that require fast footwork and an ample amount of firepower. Super power-ups Explore the city, and if you’re lucky you might find super power-ups! What the heck is in that mutagen sample?
